attributes.action: Give 3 penalty points to drivers failing to move to the inside lane after overtaking on dual carriageways and motorways.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any driver found to be not overtaking in the outside or middle lanes on Motorways or dual carriageways should be issued a fixed penalty notice. Three points added to their licences and a spot fine.
